name: Cowboys And Robots! (By Isabel)
description:
Cowboys and Robots! is a short action adventure about a cowboy trying to get home. Can you tie up these bad bots and make your way to the farm?

Controls: Use the arrow keys to move, up to jump, and spacebar to lasso. Lasso robots over the head to catch them. You can jump again once in the air.

Art and Design: Isabel Garcia

Cowboy voice: Isabel Garcia

Code and extra voices: Uncle D.

Special thanks to: Alicia Garcia

Music: bensound.com

"yey" sound: https://freesound.org/people/Reitanna/
